title: Exception mapper not handling failed login attempts
body:
### Describe the bug

I want to log failed login attempt.
So I generated quarkus RESTEasy JAX-RS example from https://code.quarkus.io/
Then applied some changes shown below.

1.Added some security [configs](https://github.com/soldev21/quarkus-security-exception-mapper/blob/1644a8e6fe93f79bcb136c95a9dda90f3f4378fa/src/main/resources/application.properties#L1)
2.Added two exception mappers. [AuthenticationFailedException](https://github.com/soldev21/quarkus-security-exception-mapper/blob/1644a8e6fe93f79bcb136c95a9dda90f3f4378fa/src/main/java/org/acme/AuthenticationFailedExceptionMapper.java#L14) and [AuthenticationCompletionException](https://github.com/soldev21/quarkus-security-exception-mapper/blob/1644a8e6fe93f79bcb136c95a9dda90f3f4378fa/src/main/java/org/acme/AuthenticationCompletionExceptionMapper.java#L13)
3.Edited the test [class](https://github.com/soldev21/quarkus-security-exception-mapper/blob/1644a8e6fe93f79bcb136c95a9dda90f3f4378fa/src/test/java/org/acme/GreetingResourceTest.java#L10).
Despite of changes above the exception mappers don't catch any exception regarding the failed Basic authentication attempt.

Any thoughts on this?

### Expected behavior

Catch AuthenticationFailedException and AuthenticationCompletionException in according exception mappers.

### Actual behavior

Bypass the exception mappers.

### How to Reproduce?

1. git clone https://github.com/soldev21/quarkus-security-exception-mapper.git
2. cd quarkus-security-exception-mapper
3. Run  `./mvnw compile quarkus:dev`
4. Open http://localhost:8080/ in browser and try to login with fake credentials
